1.text: Remove the hinges and clasp if you don’t want to paint them.

2.text: Smooth the surface of the box with 180–220-grit sandpaper.
2.vid: /7/7d/Decorate an Unfinished Wooden Box Step 2 Version 2.360p.mp4

3.text: Choose and mix the paint color you want to use for your box.
3.vid: /b/b7/Decorate an Unfinished Wooden Box Step 3 Version 2.360p.mp4

4.text: Apply a thin coat of paint to the outside of the box and let it dry for 15–20 minutes.
4.vid: /0/06/Decorate an Unfinished Wooden Box Step 4 Version 2.360p.mp4

5.text: Paint 1–2 more coats on the box if you want a more solid color.

6.text: Brush paint on the inside of the box if you don’t want to leave it unfinished.
6.vid: /7/7b/Decorate an Unfinished Wooden Box Step 6 Version 2.360p.mp4

7.text: Use a paint marker if you want to draw intricate designs.
7.vid: /c/c6/Decorate an Unfinished Wooden Box Step 7 Version 2.360p.mp4

8.text: Distress the edges of the box with sandpaper if you want a rustic look.
8.vid: /2/29/Decorate an Unfinished Wooden Box Step 8 Version 2.360p.mp4

9.text: Apply 2 coats of varnish to protect the painted surface.
9.vid: /b/be/Decorate an Unfinished Wooden Box Step 9 Version 2.360p.mp4

10.text: Paint a layer of acrylic paint on the box if you don’t want visible wood grain.

11.text: Sand the paint smooth with a piece of 180-grit sandpaper.
11.vid: /3/32/Decorate an Unfinished Wooden Box Step 11 Version 2.360p.mp4

12.text: Print the image you want to attach to the box.

13.text: Apply a layer of decoupage glue on the box where you want your image.
13.vid: /c/cd/Decorate an Unfinished Wooden Box Step 13 Version 2.360p.mp4

14.text: Lay the printed image flat on the box.
14.vid: /5/5f/Decorate an Unfinished Wooden Box Step 14 Version 2.360p.mp4

15.text: Brush the decoupage glue over the image and let it dry for 1 day.
15.vid: /a/a4/Decorate an Unfinished Wooden Box Step 15 Version 2.360p.mp4

16.text: Rub away any edges around the image with a damp sponge.

17.text: Spread a layer of acrylic varnish on the box to seal it.

18.text: Print out the design you want to add onto the box.

19.text: Place a piece of carbon paper between the printed design and the box.
19.vid: /4/4a/Decorate an Unfinished Wooden Box Step 19 Version 2.360p.mp4

20.text: Trace around the outline of your design with a pencil.

21.text: Carve around the outlines with a Dremel rotary tool.
21.vid: /b/b7/Decorate an Unfinished Wooden Box Step 21 Version 2.360p.mp4

22.text: Sand any rough edges with 180-grit sandpaper.
22.vid: /c/cc/Decorate an Unfinished Wooden Box Step 22 Version 2.360p.mp4

23.text: Rub wood stain onto the box with a rag or shop cloth.
23.vid: /1/15/Decorate an Unfinished Wooden Box Step 23 Version 2.360p.mp4

24.text: Seal the box with polyurethane wood finish to seal the stain.
